snippet: Cuba temporarily detained 178 political prisoners in January, the State Department’s senior human rights official said Tuesday. There were 489 such detentions in December.
abstract: State Department senior human rights official Tom Malinowski says Cuba temporarily detained 178 political prisoners in January, down from 489 in December 2014; warns that it may be too early to determine if reduced numbers are a trend.
lead_paragraph: Cuba temporarily detained 178 political prisoners in January, the State Department’s senior human rights official said Tuesday. There were 489 such detentions in December.

headline.main: U.S. Official Says Cuba’s Political Detentions Declined
headline.print_headline: U.S. Official Says Cuba’s Political Detentions Declined
